title: Cornering Narratives with Paul Vander Klay, Sevilla King, and GrimGriz
description:
Three people acknowledge they share a narrative in a place that doesn't exist.

@A Quality Existence 
Virtually spend some time with Sevilla's latest offering: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hq2JlVXUIGc

@Paul VanderKlay 
I'll see you in Homeroom:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzUQkcWwEVU

Special shoutout to @The Meaning Code  @Navigating Patterns @faturechi @Transfigured @Grail Country 

There's a Hoodie with Goose on it you can buy now - I knew you'd want to know
https://www.etsy.com/listing/1340501337/there-is-no-agency-unisex-zipper-hoodie

Add a Mudhut Illustration to your Christmas List:
https://mudhutillustration.com/shop/

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/2bZtrzTYza
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/
